item.title: [mic] Verdurous Gearhulk
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Trample

When Verdurous Gearhulk enters the battlefield, distribute four +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures you control.

item.title: [mic] Somberwald Sage
item.description:
Creature — Human Druid

{T}: Add three mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.

item.title: [mic] Shamanic Revelation
item.description:
Sorcery

Draw a card for each creature you control.

Ferocious — You gain 4 life for each creature you control with power 4 or greater.

item.title: [mic] Kessig Cagebreakers
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

Whenever Kessig Cagebreakers attacks, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token that's tapped and attacking for each creature card in your graveyard.

item.title: [mic] Inspiring Call
item.description:
Instant

Draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. Those creatures gain indestructible until end of turn.

item.title: [mic] Gyre Sage
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

{T}: Add {G} for each +1/+1 counter on Gyre Sage.

item.title: [mic] Growth Spasm
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

item.title: [mic] Eternal Witness
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [mic] Death's Presence
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature you control dies, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature you control, where X is the power of the creature that died.

item.title: [mic] Champion of Lambholt
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Creatures with power less than Champion of Lambholt's power can't block creatures you control.

Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of Lambholt.

item.title: [mic] Biogenic Upgrade
item.description:
Sorcery

Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures, then double the number of +1/+1 counters on each of those creatures.

item.title: [mic] Bestial Menace
item.description:
Sorcery

Create a 1/1 green Snake creature token, a 2/2 green Wolf creature token, and a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

item.title: [mic] Beast Within
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

item.title: [mic] Avacyn's Pilgrim
item.description:
Creature — Human Monk

{T}: Add {W}.

item.title: [mic] Undead Augur
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Wizard

Whenever Undead Augur or another Zombie you control dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

item.title: [mic] Syphon Flesh
item.description:
Sorcery

Each other player sacrifices a creature. You create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each creature sacrificed this way.

item.title: [mic] Spark Reaper
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

{3}, Sacrifice a creature or planeswalker: You gain 1 life and draw a card.

item.title: [mic] Overseer of the Damned
item.description:
Creature — Demon

Flying

When Overseer of the Damned enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature.

Whenever a nontoken creature an opponent controls dies, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

item.title: [mic] Open the Graves
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

item.title: [mic] Midnight Reaper
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Knight

Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, Midnight Reaper deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.

item.title: [mic] Lord of the Accursed
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

Other Zombies you control get +1/+1.

{1}{B}, {T}: All Zombies gain menace until end of turn.

item.title: [mic] Liliana's Mastery
item.description:
Enchantment

Zombies you control get +1/+1.

When Liliana's Mastery enters the battlefield, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

item.title: [mic] Liliana's Devotee
item.description:
Creature — Human Warlock

Zombies you control get +1/+0.

At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

item.title: [mic] Liliana, Death's Majesty
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Liliana

+1: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Mill two cards.

−3: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

−7: Destroy all non-Zombie creatures.

item.title: [mic] Gravespawn Sovereign
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

Tap five untapped Zombies you control: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

item.title: [mic] Go for the Throat
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target nonartifact creature.

item.title: [mic] Fleshbag Marauder
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Warrior

When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

item.title: [mic] Feed the Swarm
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. You lose life equal to that permanent's mana value.

item.title: [mic] Endless Ranks of the Dead
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of your upkeep, create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is half the number of Zombies you control, rounded down.

item.title: [mic] Eater of Hope
item.description:
Creature — Demon

Flying

{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Regenerate Eater of Hope.

{2}{B}, Sacrifice two other creatures: Destroy target creature.

item.title: [mic] Dread Summons
item.description:
Sorcery

Each player mills X cards. For each creature card put into a graveyard this way, you create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

item.title: [mic] Dreadhorde Invasion
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

Whenever a Zombie token you control with power 6 or greater attacks, it gains lifelink until end of turn.

item.title: [mic] Diregraf Colossus
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Giant

Diregraf Colossus enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each Zombie card in your graveyard.

Whenever you cast a Zombie spell, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

item.title: [mic] Death Baron
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Wizard

Skeletons you control and other Zombies you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch.

item.title: [mic] Dark Salvation
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player creates X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, then up to one target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each Zombie that player controls.

item.title: [mic] Corpse Augur
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Wizard

When Corpse Augur dies, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of creature cards in target player's graveyard.

item.title: [mic] Cemetery Reaper
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1.

{2}{B}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

item.title: [mic] Butcher of Malakir
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Warrior

Flying

Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

item.title: [mic] Army of the Damned
item.description:
Sorcery

Create thirteen tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

Flashback {7}{B}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [mic] Undead Alchemist
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

If a Zombie you control would deal combat damage to a player, instead that player mills that many cards.

Whenever a creature card is put into an opponent's graveyard from their library, exile that card and create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

item.title: [mic] Stitcher Geralf
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Wizard

{2}{U}, {T}: Each player mills three cards. Exile up to two creature cards put into graveyards this way. Create an X/X blue Zombie creature token, where X is the total power of the cards exiled this way.

item.title: [mic] Rooftop Storm
item.description:
Enchantment

You may pay {0} rather than pay the mana cost for Zombie creature spells you cast.

item.title: [mic] Hour of Eternity
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile X target creature cards from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie.

item.title: [mic] Havengul Runebinder
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

{2}{U}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Zombie creature you control.

item.title: [mic] Forgotten Creation
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Horror

Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may discard all the cards in your hand. If you do, draw that many cards.

item.title: [mic] Eternal Skylord
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Wizard

When Eternal Skylord enters the battlefield, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

Zombie tokens you control have flying.

item.title: [mic] Distant Melody
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type.

item.title: [mic] Aetherspouts
item.description:
Instant

For each attacking creature, its owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.

item.title: [mic] Victory's Envoy
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

item.title: [mic] Unbreakable Formation
item.description:
Instant

Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures and they gain vigilance until end of turn.
